oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The springbok possess magic or invisible arrows which make people ill. Little children are not allowed to play on the springbok's skin, because the springbok gets under the people's flesh and makes them ill. 1) See also !nanna-sse, and Sorcerers shoot with invisible arrows, causing illness, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-14.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Springbok possess magic arrows
